# Plex Fix Futures

## Overview

Plex Fix Futures is a Saltbox module that Sets Plex items stuck in the future back to the past.

---
<!-- END SALTBOX MANAGED OVERVIEW SECTION -->

## Deployment

```shell
sb install plex-fix-futures
```
